amendment.description: To recognize that charities, non-profit organizations, religious organizations, and businesses of the United States have an important role in addressing humanitarian crises.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1103 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1103 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S6140; text: CR S6140) To recognize that charities, non-profit organizations, religious organizations, and businesses of the United States have an important role in addressing humanitarian crises.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1103 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Lee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1103 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
